title: Top Students by GPA
description: Write a query to find students whose average grade is above 85. Display name and avg_grade (rounded to 2 decimal places), ordered by average grade descending.
hint: Join students with enrollments, use AVG() and HAVING, and ROUND() to format the result.
solution: SELECT students.name, ROUND(AVG(enrollments.grade), 2) as avg_grade FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id GROUP BY students.name HAVING AVG(enrollments.grade) > 85 ORDER BY avg_grade DESC
